hadiths.text: Hafsa (Allah be pleased with her) said:Messenger of Allah; the rest of the hadith is the same and (the concluding words of the Holy Prophet):" I won't put off Ihram until I have sacrificed the animal

chapter.ara-name: باب بَيَانِ أَنَّ الْقَارِنَ لاَ يَتَحَلَّلُ إِلاَّ فِي وَقْتِ تَحَلُّلِ الْحَاجِّ الْمُفْرِدِ
chapter.eng-name: The pilgrim performing Qiran should not exit Ihram except when the pilgrims performing Ifrad exit Ihram
